long_description: The Woolrich Explorer's Peak Travel Blanket unfolds to give you a soft, warm polyester fleece top backed by a water-repellent polyester liner, and zips up to create its own carry case,. Travel blanket is great for picnicking, sporting events, concerts, road trips and more. Place the water-repellent, vinyl-coated side down to protect your clothing and food from sand, dirt or wet grass. Blanket folds up and zips closed to create the carry case. Pocket on the vinyl side of blanket/carry case can hold a book, magazine or snacks, and has a flap with rip-and-stick closure. Web strap lets you easily carry the Woolrich Explorer's Peak Travel Blanket. Machine washable.
